title: Singer
description:
A singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone, and sometimes musical notes.

iOS and Android display this emoji as a Bowie-esque figure while WhatsApp appears heavily inspired by Prince.
apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs singer emoji captures a dynamic performer, often depicted with a microphone held close and a passionate expression. The design on Apple devices features vibrant colors and crisp details, with a slight sheen that suggests stage lights and energy. Its smooth, stylized features and expressive mouth convey a sense of musical joy and vocal talent, ideal for celebrating performances, expressing love for music, or indicating someone is about to belt out a tune.
